price: (Nsedie a) εtͻso nnum no (na waka) sε: “Sε ͻbarima no ka nokorεfoͻ no ho a, Nyankopͻn abufuo mmra ͻno (ͻbaa) no so.
arabic: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةَ أَنَّ غَضَبَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهَآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wal-khāmisata anna ghaḍaba al-lahi ʿalayhā in kāna mina al-ṣādiqīna
